Name: Iggy's Zombie A-Pug-Alypse
About the game: Iggy is a happy-go-lucky Pug that lives in a mansion with the Duchess Bianca. One day Iggy awakes to find the mansion is overrun with Zombies and Bianca is missing. Can you reunite Iggy and Bianca in this action packed Puzzle-Strategy game? 70 ACTION PACKED LEVELS Solve every Puzzle your way! Draw any path for Iggy to follow through each Zombie infested level. PUG-LIFE SAVING POWER-UPS Timing is everything! Activate Power-Ups at the right time and help the little Pug to evade the walking dead. KNOW YOUR ZOMBIES Braaaains! Help Iggy outmanoeuvre Acid Spitting Zombies, Burning Zombies, Charging Zombies, Electrifying Zombies and many more using perfect timing and your own strategy. BONUS LEVELS Collect them all! Unlock all 7 Bonus Levels by beating the high scores of every world.
